entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and local blowing snow. Wind becoming east 40 km/h gusting to 60 early this evening then light before morning. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 21. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
